resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107979</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107979</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dinosaurs: Ancient Fossils, New Discoveries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dinosauriere: Alte Fossilien, Neue 
Entdeckungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dinosaurs : Fossiles Antiques, Nouvelles 
Découvertes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dinosaurs: Fossils Antigos, Descobertas 
Novas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dinosaurs: Fossili Antichi, Nuove Scoperte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεινόσαυροι: Αρχαία απολιθώματα, νέες 
ανακαλύψεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dinosaurios: Fósiles Antiguos, Nuevos 
Descubrimientos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">updates what we know about dinosaurs from recent studies of their tracks, how they moved, and their unusual body parts (e.g. spikes, armor). Extinction examines the mass extinction 65 million years ago -- the possible causes, how many of the plants and animals alive at that time died out, and which dinosaurs survived. Interviews with paleontologists are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktualisierungsvorgänge was wir über 
Dinosauriere von den neuen Studien ihrer Spuren kennen, wie sie 
umzogen, und ihre ungewöhnlichen Körperteile (z.B. Spitzen, 
Rüstung). Vor Löschung überprüft die Massenlöschung 65 
Million Jahren -- die möglichen Ursachen, wieviele der Betriebe und 
der Tiere, die zu dieser Zeit lebendig sind, heraus starb und welche 
Dinosauriere überlebten. Interviews mit Paläontologen sind 
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mises à jour ce que nous connaissons des 
dinosaurs des études récentes de leurs pistes, comment elles se sont
déplacées, et leurs pièces de corps peu communes (par exemple 
transitoires, armure). L'extinction examine l'extinction de 
masse il y a 65 millions d'ans -- les causes possibles, lesquels des 
usines et des animaux vivants à ce moment-là est mort dehors, et 
quels dinosaurs ont survécu. Les entrevues avec des 
paléontologistes sont incluses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">updates o que nós sabemos sobre dinosaurs dos 
estudos recentes de suas trilhas, como se moveram, e suas peças de 
corpo incomuns (por exemplo pontos, armor). A extinção examina
a extinção maciça 65 milhão anos há -- as causas possíveis, 
quanto das plantas e dos animais vivos nesse tempo morreu para fora, e
que dinosaurs sobreviveram. As entrevistas com paleontologists 
são incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aggiornamenti che cosa conosciamo circa i 
dinosaurs dagli studi recenti delle loro piste, come si sono mossi e 
le loro parti di corpo insolite (per esempio punti, armatura). 
L'estinzione esamina l'estinzione totale 65 milione anni fa -- 
le cause possibili, quant0 delle piante e degli animali vivi a quel 
tempo ha morto fuori e quali dinosaurs sono sopravvissuto. Le 
interviste con i paleontologists sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενημερώνει τι ξέρουμε για τους δεινοσαύρους από τις 
πρόσφατες μελέτες των διαδρομών τους, πώς κινήθηκαν, και τα 
ασυνήθιστα μέρη σωμάτων τους (π.χ. ακίδες, τεθωρακισμένο). 
Η εξάλειψη εξετάζει τη μαζική εξάλειψη 65 εκατομμύριο 
έτη πριν -- οι πιθανές αιτίες, πόσους από τα φυτά και τα ζώα 
ζωντανά εκείνη την περίοδο πέθανε έξω, και ποιοι δεινόσαυροι 
επέζησαν. Οι συνεντεύξεις με τα παλαιοντολόγος 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actualizaciones qué sabemos sobre dinosaurios de 
estudios recientes de sus pistas, cómo se movieron, y sus piezas de 
cuerpo inusuales (e.g. puntos, armadura). La extinción examina 
la extinción total hace 65 millones de años -- las causas posibles, 
cuántos de las plantas y de los animales vivos en aquella 'epoca 
murió hacia fuera, y sobrevivieron qué dinosaurios. Las 
entrevistas con los paleontólogos son incluidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107979</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dinosaurs-ancient-fossils-new-discoveries</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
